content: archived pdf http //web archive org/web/20130525232538/http //www caron com/projects/jb/jb_scarf pdf materials caron jewel box™ * discontinued * 12 5 oz tigereye size k-10 5 crochet hook or size to reach gauge below gauge 3 shells and 5 row in pat = 3 in take time to check gauge stitches used chain st chain slip st slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet shell work in pattern 1-row repeat to desired length finish with side edging and fringe
